newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Salomon keeps NationsBank at hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Salomon keeps NationsBank at hold.

text.p: -- Salomon Brothers reiterated its hold rating on NationsBank Corp but said it will likely lower its earnings estimate for the company. It also kept a hold rating on Boatmen's Bancshares Inc.
-- Placed NationsBank 1997 earnings estimate under review and said a $0.50 reduction from the current $9.15 per share was likely as a result of the Boatmen's deal.
-- Called NationsBank management projections "aggressive but doable."
-- Called the Boatmen's deal pricing "rich and in some ways pre-emptive to other interested merger partners."
